text: Dryden is an unincorporated village in the town of Wilton, Franklin County, Maine, United States. The community is located along U.S. Route 2, Maine State Route 4, and Maine State Route 156 south-southwest of Farmington. Dryden has a post office with ZIP code 04225, which opened on January 30, 1899. ==References== Category:Villages in Franklin County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: Dryden, Maine
